Kerry's wife taken to MGH

Teresa Heinz Kerry, 74, the wife of US Secretary of State John F. Kerry, is at Massachusetts General Hospital after being hospitalized earlier today on Nantucket, where she was listed in "critical but stable condition," a hospital spokesman said.

Fire officials told a coroner's office that one of the victims killed may have been struck on the runway after the plane crash, an official said.
